name: Sunshine app with Seoulites
tagline: Making Sunshine app for Udacity Course
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Page of Sunshine app.
This app will be created step by step in accordance with Udacity's Developing Android Apps course.The purpose of creating a separate GitHub project for learners in Seoul is to create it from scratch, and while doing so, collaborate with each other.

### Weekly Updates
We will branch out our code on weekly basis and push to GitHub.  All changes will be merged in Master as well. 

### Support or Contact
If you are interested to learn with us, join our community on Google+ :  https://plus.google.com/u/1/communities/104694334005501290053/    Shoot us an email at mooccircle@gmail.com anytime!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
